cat_seo_description: Buy InFocus Projector at the best price in Bangladesh. Latest InFocus Projector available at Star Tech Shop. Order online to get delivery anywhere in BD.
full_description:
InFocus IN2134 4500-Lumen XGA DLP Projector

The InFocus IN2134 4500-Lumen XGA DLP Projector offers crisp pictures even in spaces with a lot of ambient light. Its 4500 lumens of brightness may frequently outperform ambient light, and its 28,500:1 dynamic contrast ratio will aid to improve detail in the image's darker sections without diminishing overall brightness. Text will be legible at most viewing distances thanks to its native XGA 1024 x 768 resolution. The IN2134 includes an RCA composite video input, a VGA input, and HDMI inputs that enable 3D content. A container that conceals a USB power port and one of the HDMI inputs allows you to attach a suitable streaming device. There will be no need for external speakers thanks to its 1/8" audio input and 10W built-in speaker, but if you'd rather, you may connect to a different audio system via its 1/8" audio output. Crestron, AMX, or InFocus Projector Net 4.1 software may operate the IN2134.

By using the TechStation, increase smart connectivity.

The InFocus IN2134 4500-Lumen Projector The TechStation makes it possible to study more effectively by using the resources you currently have by providing an HDMI 1.4 connector and a range of device compatibility. Close the TechStation's cover after plugging in your device to create an all-in-one streaming audio and video solution. The Google Chromecast Ultra, Intel Computer Stick, Asus Chromebit, Amazon Fire TV Stick, Android Stick, and other streaming devices are all compatible.

Low-Noise Design

The IN2134 is made to run quietly, with a noise level of under 21 dB in Eco mode, Smooth Flow technology, an effective cooling enclosure, and low-noise bearings.

Brilliant Color DLP Technology

The IN2134 is designed to show clean, clear pictures in a variety of lighting circumstances thanks to its 4500-lumen output and 28,500:1 contrast ratio. Additionally, the projector can output over 1 billion colors thanks to BrilliantColor DLP imaging, ensuring vivid presentations on whiteboards, blackboards, or beige walls in almost any lighting.

Designed for Easy Installation and Management

Use the free ProjectorNet 4.1 software from InFocus to install and administer the projector over your network, or go with Crestron Roomview or AMX Device Discovery.

Manual Zoom & Triple HDMI

The IN2134 has a long throw and a magnification that goes up to 1.3x for more positioning freedom. Multiple digital sources may be linked via an additional HDMI port, saving time on changing connections. The InFocus IN2134 4500-Lumen Projector comes with 2 years (1-year parts Lamp warranty 1000 hours 2nd-year service warranty).
